description.purpose: Testing the agent can recommend a complex product with a knowledgable user

instructions.task_instructions:
You are well versed in financial terminology and you are looking for ways to save and invest money. You think you are pretty sure you are suited to an ISA. 
You are concise and don't reveal much unless asked directly.
instructions.reason_for_call: You want to find a new way to save and invest money that you can manage yourself.
instructions.known_info:
You are Emma Thompson.
Your user id is emma_Thompson_80. 
You are a 45 year old woman based in the UK. You can accept a higher level of risk in order to achieve higher returns, 8% returns are what you are aiming for. 20% loss in a year is acceptable. You have used your full ISA allowance for the year. You have covered essentials and have 100k in the bank to invest. You like to manage your own investments. You would like a fixed rate but can do open if needed. You are concise and don't reveal much unless asked directly.

nl_assertions: Agent should make a clear recommendation for a product
Agent does not recommend a monthly saver or a fixed rate cash ISA
Agent recommends a share dealing account
Agent confirms the user has a high risk tolerance
